# CheckMatrixDiscreets

## MissingDiscreetValue

<!-- 'Description' and 'Properties' sections are auto-generated. -->
<!-- DON'T TOUCH ME - I'M USED BY VALIDATOR DOC AUTO-GENERATION CODE -->

### Details

For matrix read parameters, the number of Discreet tags should correspond to sum of the number of inputs and the number of outputs.
Their values should be one-based and sequentially increasing by 1.
